page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF BEN
page.content: My name is{Ben Tooke.}I am 10 years old. This is an ordinary day in my life. I get up about 8 o'clock, get dressed and have my breakfast. I let out our two{Old English {Sheepdogs }and watch them in the field next to the house.The school minibus comes at 8.25. My sister and I go to {Barrow School.}There are only 55 children. We do maths , writing stories and reading. Sometimes we do art or games. Sometimes we go swimming,or on visits. We have dinner at 12 o'clock,and then a long playtime. I go home at 3.15. When I get home I play outside. I go climbing trees with my friends and collecting conkers.If it's wet I stay in and watch television or a video.I go to bed about 9 o'clock.
